Keys Action Value Move UP W Move DOWN S Move LEFT A Move RIGHT D Attack UP Arrow UP Attack DOWN Arrow DOWN Attack LEFT Arrow LEFT Attack RIGHT Arrow RIGHT Swap Melee/Gun Q Perform Spin/Multishot Maintain SHIFT when attack Open curse menu Space Close curse menu Enter Select LEFT curse 1 Select RIGHT curse 2 Description

The devil was bored with the daily hardships and chooses, among all the world's population, a man in a suit to pass his tests for entertainment...

The character will now have to defeat the enemies that were sent by the devil to take his life by accepting curses from him, in case he selects one he will refill a life and some bullets, otherwise he will not be refilled. When the character attacks melee he will also refill one bullet per hit target.
